subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Kris Joseph had a career-high 27 points, Scoop Jardine scored 17 of his 21 in the second half, and No. 5 Syracuse beat visiting Providence, 81-74.
snippet: Kris Joseph had a career-high 27 points, Scoop Jardine scored 17 of his 21 in the second half, and No. 5 Syracuse beat visiting Providence, 81-74.
